title: Zucchini & Parmesan Baked Eggs
short_description: A quick, easy, and nutritious baked eggs recipe perfect for a light brunch or breakfast.

steps.title: Sauté Zucchini
steps.description: Heat olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add grated zucchini and sauté until tender (about 3 minutes), seasoning with salt and pepper

steps.title: Prepare Baking Dishes
steps.description: Divide the sautéed zucchini between four small greased baking dishes. Make a well in the center of each and crack an egg into the well. Sprinkle with grated Parmesan.

steps.title: Bake Eggs
steps.description: Bake in the oven for 5-7 minutes or until the egg whites are set but yolks are still runny. Adjust the time if you prefer a firmer yolk.

steps.title: Garnish and Serve
steps.description: Remove from oven, garnish with fresh herbs if using, and serve immediately.
